location.name: Yoruzuya Gin-Chan
location.description: Welcome to Yoruzuya Gin-Chan.  If you do not have any money, get out.

food.name: Sukonbu
food.description: Pickled seaweed from Kagura's stash (makes your breath smell bad)
food.consequence: Kagura drop kicked you.  You died.

food.name: Chocolate Parfait
food.consequence: Gin-chan's doctors said he could only have one a week because of his sugar levels.  He drop kicked you.  You died.

food.name: Tea and biscuits
food.description: Megane-kun is serving, so it's most likely safe

food.name: Dom Perignon
food.description: Do you want to go bankrupt?
food.consequence: Your wallet has died, but you are alive.

weapon.name: Kagura's umbrella
weapon.description: A Yato clan umbrella, and is OP

weapon.name: Lake Touya
weapon.description: Gin-chan's bokuto which miraculously hasn't broken yet

location.name: Shinsengumi HQ
location.description: Welcome to Shinsengumi HQ.  Hopefully you have already read the Kyokucho Hatto; if you haven't, commit seppuku.  Also, we don't work for free.

food.name: Hijikata Special
food.consequence: Quite honestly, I'm surprised you're still alive after eating that dog food.  Needless to say, Hijikata is proud of you

food.name: Anpan
food.consequence: God of Anpan has given you good luck on your stake outs

food.name: Shinsengumi Sausage
food.description: To be honest, a normal sausage with a glorified brand

weapon.name: Neo Armstrong Cyclone Jet Armstrong Canon
weapon.description: A gigantic canon fused with a JustAway

weapon.name: Kiku-ichimonji RX-7
weapon.description: Okita's sword with a built-in MP3 player
